text: Charles C. Eldredge is an American art historian, Emeritus Hall Distinguished Professor at University of Kansas and was Director of the National Museum of American Art, Smithsonian Institution from 1982-1988. He oversaw the construction of the Spencer Museum of Art. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:University of Kansas faculty Category:American art historians Category:University of Minnesota alumni Category:Amherst College alumni
title: Charles C. Eldredge
